channel.title: Ascaria - 2006 Economy Based Server - HIRING WEB DEVELOPERS!
channel.description:
[center]Are you interested in joining the Ascaria team? Do you think you have what it takes to be a [b]web developer?[/b] If you answered yes to these questions, we have good news: we're hiring!
There are some requirements that must be followed to join the Web Development team:
[ul][li]Portfolio of past work[/li] [li]3+ years of web development experience[/li] [li]17 years or older[/li] [li]Ability to work with vBulletin forums[/li] [li]Showing Maturity[/li][/ul]
If you meet these requirements, the team is looking to hire you!
Add "jon.niemiec" on Skype if you are interested with this position. First come first serve, so apply fast (no application - questions are based in an interview by owner of Ascaria)!
View our website here: [url=http://www.ascaria.org/forums/forum.php]http://www.ascaria.org/forums/forum.php[/url]
With regards, Mod Jon Owner of Ascaria[/center]

item.title: Ascaria - 2006 Economy Based Server - HIRING WEB DEVELOPERS!
item.dc:creator: @Ascaria Ascaria
item.description:
@Ascaria wrote:

[center]Are you interested in joining the Ascaria team? Do you think you have what it takes to be a web developer? If you answered yes to these questions, we have good news: we’re hiring!

There are some requirements that must be followed to join the Web Development team:

[ul][li]Portfolio of past work[/li]
[li]3+ years of web development experience[/li]
[li]17 years or older[/li]
[li]Ability to work with vBulletin forums[/li]
[li]Showing Maturity[/li][/ul]

If you meet these requirements, the team is looking to hire you!

Add “jon.niemiec” on Skype if you are interested with this position. First come first serve, so apply fast (no application - questions are based in an interview by owner of Ascaria)!

View our website here: http://www.ascaria.org/forums/forum.php

With regards,
Mod Jon
Owner of Ascaria[/center]
